definition: the chirping of birds or insects/noise/clamor/buzzing/disturbance
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: The yawp pollution of freeway to the ambience is rather severe.
sentences.chinese: 高速公路對周邊環境的噪聲污染是較嚴重的。

sentences.english: This paper considers the single record estimators for cumulants of sinusoids in additive noise.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論有噪聲污染的諧波信號累量的單一記錄估計。

sentences.english: The model synthesises factors of nature and noise pollution in city.
sentences.chinese: 該模型綜合了城市自然因素和噪聲污染因素。
